title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 830.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 830.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part are applicable to all OASAS
certified, approved or otherwise authorized programs seeking to offer or
provide certain services or therapies including, but not limited to, acupuncture and telehealth, or other such services, therapies or program
endorsements as may be defined in this Part. Such services may require
application for an operating certificate "designation" indicating approval by
the Office to provide such services. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
